text: 3.13: Sek 14.5; 1 Ko 1.8; Fi 1.10; 2 Te 1.7; 1.10; 2.17Nde mba tɨvara muunga, Fhe Bakɨme nde ndavi havhargirga. Ana nde ndavi havhargirim, nde kɨrim, nza Bakɨme Zisas taagi won gumgi gu mbigir kov zirɨrga, ana nde ganɨrim, nde ŋgaravra kɨrga. Nde vhɨra nzerara kɨv, nde nza wo Ndia Fhe Bakɨme nɨman bigɨna mbatɨga thueŋ muuŋgi ne suaŋv kama thueŋ kɨrga fhu. Ne guigi guarara.
